@Porshapwr That said, if I have a PS5, maybe I'll consider buying it on discount, though, since I really don't think I can finish it. :d

@Porshapwr Great read. Sounds it could be stressful if I'm not that good at playing, and why can't they implement "save and quit", then continues later? Especially when a power outage could kill your run horribly.

Played #Subnautica. Peaceful and pretty game, doing pretty fine so far. And then I decided to visit the crashed ship, got eaten by reaper leviathan on the way back, lost all progress at the ship. Ragequitted the game. Well that was a short experience. :d https://t.co/knL6NcFmsp

On closer inspection, it could be unscheduled maintenance that killed all tapatalk forum. But still doesn't change the fact that the forum is largely inactive. Maybe when Bamco finally announce a new Super Robot Wars game.

The Super Robot Wars Genesis forum in tapatalk has died, apparently. ( https://t.co/5Q6sAMVOge ) It was a dying forum, and I guess it's finally gone. Have a lot of memories there, very sad to see it gone. https://t.co/AU44zfk37Y
